summary: A new student at a British public school forms a secret society centered around cooking and midnight feasting with other school misfits and outcasts.
cast: John Hurley|Freddie Findlay|Sebastian Armesto|Robert Hardy|Carol MacReady|Andrew Lusher|Aled Roberts|Stuart Hawley|Jordan Ruffell|Edward Hassard|Matthew Blakiston|Dominic Dowbekin|Harry Stapleton|Jake Meyer|Tom Radcliffe|Lisa Faulkner|Christopher Lee|Samuel West|Julie Dreyfus|Michael Gove|Dan Fenton|Michael Fenner|Julian Ellison|Brian Cant|Stuart Moore|Jane Moore|Jack Fletcher|Edward Fox|Bruce McCrae|Max Elliot|George Elliot|Les Harding|Leigh Burr|Sally Massey|Jan Price|Heidi Vines|Paul Dowbekin|Rosemary Dowbekin|Martin Butt|Donald Duncan|Dominic Le Moignan|Nicolas Le Moignan|Colyn Moore|Oliver Goodwill
title: A Feast at Midnight
